card.name: Desertion
card.property: (X is equal to the value staked on this treaty.) The player who broke this treaty gives control of a character they control with the highest printed cost of X or lower to the player who did not break this treaty.

card.name: Dishonorable Dealings
card.property: (X is equal to the value staked on this treaty.) The player who broke this treaty dishonors a character they control with the highest printed cost of X or lower.

card.name: Exposed Secrets
card.property: (X is equal to the value staked on this treaty.) The player who did not break this treaty draws X cards.

card.name: Falling Fortune
card.property: (X is equal to the value staked on this treaty.) The player who broke this treaty loses X fate.

card.name: Finding a New Lord
card.property: (X is equal to the value staked on this treaty.) The player who did not break this treaty gains X fate.

card.name: Forgotten Plans
card.property: (X is equal to the value staked on this treaty.) The player who broke this treaty discards X cards from their hand.

card.name: Second Chances
card.property: (X is equal to the value staked on this treaty.) The player who did not break this treaty distributes X fate among characters they control.

card.name: Sent to their Deaths
card.property: (X is equal to the value staked on this treaty.) The player who broke this treaty discards a total of X fate from characters they control.

card.name: Shattered Blades
card.property: (X is equal to the value staked on this treaty.) The player who broke this treaty discards X attachments they control.

card.name: Spreading Discontent
card.property: (X is equal to the value staked on this treaty.) The player who broke this treaty bows a character they control with the highest printed cost of X or lower.

card.name: Transgression of Honor
card.property: (X is equal to the value staked on this treaty.) The player who broke this treaty loses X honor.

card.name: Upholding Bushidō
card.property: (X is equal to the value staked on this treaty.) The player who did not break this treaty gains X honor.

card.name: Slaughtered Village
card.property: Interrupt: When this province is broken – resolve the effect of each ring claimed on it as if you were the attacking player.

card.name: Model of Courtesy
card.property: Interrupt: When a province you control is broken, choose an unbroken province you control - move a ring claimed on the broken province to the chosen province.

card.name: Karmic Teachings
card.property: Interrupt: When this province is broken – move each ring claimed on it to your unclaimed ring pool.

card.name: Strategizing
card.property: Reaction: After a province you control is revealed - redistribute the rings claimed on your provinces among eligible provinces you control.

card.name: Fury of the Kami
card.property: Interrupt: When a province you control is broken, choose a ring claimed on that province - resolve that ring's effect as if you were the attacking player.

card.name: Shadowed Alleyway
card.property: Reaction: After an attack is declared against this province, choose another unbroken non-stronghold province you control - move a claimed ring from this province to the chosen province.

card.name: Fields of the Wind
card.property: Action: During a conflict at this province, choose 2 rings claimed on different provinces you control - move each of those rings to the other chosen ring's province.

card.name: Temple of Daikoku
card.property: This province gets +2 strength for each claimed [Water] ring. Forced Reaction: After an attack is declared against this province - place 1 fate on each unclaimed [Water] ring.

card.name: Temple of Jikoju
card.property: This province gets +2 strength for each claimed [Air] ring. Forced Reaction: After an attack is declared against this province - place 1 fate on each unclaimed [Air] ring.

card.name: Temple of Osano-wo
card.property: This province gets +2 strength for each claimed [Earth] ring. Forced Reaction: After an attack is declared against this province - place 1 fate on each unclaimed [Earth] ring.

card.name: Temple of Shinsei's Wisdom
card.property: This province gets +2 strength for each claimed [Void] ring. Forced Reaction: After an attack is declared against this province - place 1 fate on each unclaimed [Void] ring.

card.name: Temple of the Thunders
card.property: This province gets +2 strength for each claimed [Fire] ring. Forced Reaction: After an attack is declared against this province - place 1 fate on each unclaimed [Fire] ring.

card.name: Hida Secretkeeper
card.property: This character gets +2[Military] and +2[Political] while defending a province with 1 or more rings claimed on it.

card.name: One of the Forgotten
card.property: You cannot place fate on this character when it is played from your provinces. Reaction: After an opponent passes on declaring a conflict, if that opponent controls any ready characters - put 1 fate on this character.

card.name: Sake House Smuggler
card.property: Support. (Another player may help pay this card's fate cost.)Action: During the conflict phase, choose another player - until the end of the phase, the next non-event card you play and the next non-event card that player plays each has its cost to play reduced by 1.

card.name: Kuni Silencer
card.property: Reaction: After this character wins a conflict as the defender - your opponent must return a ring from his or her claimed ring pool to the unclaimed ring pool.

card.name: Roadside Inn
card.property: Reaction: After the fate phase begins, choose a character. Each opponent may give you 1 honor and choose a character - each player who chose a character in this way moves 1 fate from their fate pool to their chosen character, if able.

card.name: Chancellor's Aide
card.property: Interrupt: When this character leaves play, choose a player. Each opponent may give you 1 honor and choose a player - each chosen player discards 1 card from their hand.

card.name: Dazzling Duelist
card.property: Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Military] duel against a character your opponent controls of their choice - resolve the duel. The controller of the duel's loser cannot claim rings during this conflict.

card.name: Perfect Guest
card.property: Action: Choose another player - that player gains control of this character and cannot trigger this ability this round.

card.name: Masterpiece Painter
card.property: Support. (Another player may help pay this card's fate cost.)Action: Choose any number of players - each of those players reveals the top card of their conflict deck. Until the end of the phase, each of those players may play their revealed card as if it were in their hand.

card.name: Negotiation Table
card.property: Action: In turn order each opponent may select 1 or more of the following - - draw 1 card. - choose and ready a character. - gain 1 fate. Then, you do each option once for each opponent that selected that option.

card.name: Inventive Mirumoto
card.property: Action: If you have claimed the [Water] ring, choose an attachment in your discard pile - play that attachment on this character (paying all costs).

card.name: Agasha Prodigy
card.property: Action: Choose a character. Each opponent may give you 1 honor and choose a character - each player that chose a character discards the top card of their conflict deck. Each attachment a player discards this way is put into play attached to the character that player chose.

card.name: Ascetic of the North Wall
card.property: While you have claimed the [Earth] ring, this character cannot lose fate or be discarded outside the fate phase.

card.name: Mindful Warrior
card.property: Reaction: After this character wins a conflict, choose a ring in your unclaimed ring pool - switch that ring with a ring claimed on one of your provinces, gaining all fate on it.

card.name: Alchemical Laboratory
card.property: While you have claimed the [Fire] ring, each attachment you control on another player's character gains ancestral.

card.name: Ikoma Message Runner
card.property: Support. (Another player may help pay this card's fate cost.)Action: For each player, choose up to 1 facedown card in that player's provinces - turn each chosen card faceup.

card.name: Righteous Akodo
card.property: This character gets +2[Political] while attacking or defending a province with 1 or more rings claimed on it.

card.name: Battle Aspirant
card.property: Reaction: After this character is declared as an attacker in a [Military] conflict, choose a character your opponent controls without covert - the chosen character must be declared as a defender in this conflict, if able.

card.name: Medium of the Living Soul
card.property: Action: During a conflict, choose a participating character - until the end of the conflict, that character gains: "Reaction: After you resolve a ring effect during a conflict in which this character is participating, remove 1 fate from this character - resolve that effect again."

card.name: Bushidō Adherent
card.property: Support. (Another player may help pay this card's fate cost.)Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating, choose a participating character - honor that character. Your opponent draws 1 card.

card.name: Expert Interpreter
card.property: Reaction: After the conflict phase begins, choose a ring. Each opponent may give you 1 honor and choose a ring - during each conflict in which one of the chosen rings is contested, characters cannot enter play.

card.name: Isawa Pilgrim
card.property: Pride. Action: Choose another player who has claimed the [Water] ring – that player gains control of this character.

card.name: Mediator of Hostilities
card.property: Reaction: After a player passes on declaring a conflict - draw 1 card. (Limit twice per round.)

card.name: Serene Seer
card.property: Support. (Another player may help pay this card's fate cost.)Action: For each opponent that has claimed the [Void] ring, choose a facedown province that player controls - look at each chosen province.

card.name: Hallowed Ground
card.property: Each opponent that has claimed - the [Air] ring loses 1 honor when they lose a conflict unopposed. - the [Earth] ring cannot claim rings that were claimed on provinces they break. - the [Fire] cannot put fate on character they play.

card.name: Shepherd of Visages
card.property: Action: During a conflict, choose a participating character – that character gets –2 glory until the end of the conflict.

card.name: Shosuro Actor
card.property: Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating, choose a non-unique character you do not control - this character becomes a copy of that character until the end of the conflict.

card.name: Vice Proprietor
card.property: Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating, dishonor it. Choose an opponent, than that opponent chooses a participating character you do not control - bow that character.

card.name: Master Whisperer
card.property: Support. (Another player may help pay this card's fate cost.)Action: Choose a player - that player discards 3 cards from their hand and draws 3 cards.

card.name: Acclaimed Geisha House
card.property: Action: During a conflict, dishonor a (friendly) participating character and choose an unclaimed ring - switch the contested ring with the chosen ring. (The conflict retains its type.)

card.name: Altansarnai's Vanguard
card.property: During each conflict against a province with 1 or more rings claimed on it, this character cannot be bowed by card or ring effects.

card.name: Merchant of Curiosities
card.property: Action: Discard a card from your hand. Each opponent may give you 1 honor and discard a card from their hand - each player who discards a card this way draws 1 card.

card.name: Endless Plains Skirmisher
card.property: Action: During a conflict, choose a player - move this character to the conflict on that player's side. (You still control this character, but its skill contributes towards that player's side in the conflict.)

card.name: Way Station Trader
card.property: Limited. (No more than one limited card can be played by each player each round.)Reaction: After a province is revealed during a conflict in which this character is participating, choose an opponent - take 1 fate from that opponent.

card.name: Forthright Ide
card.property: Support. (Another player may help pay this card's fate cost.) (Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating, choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower - ready that character. If you control that character, discard 1 card from you hand.

card.name: Shika Matchmaker
card.property: Each card in your hand gains support. (Another player may help pay that card's fate cost.)

card.name: Cunning Confidant
card.property: While participating in a conflict against a player with more claimed rings than you, that character gets +2[Political].

card.name: Insightful Gatekeeper
card.property: While participating in a conflict against a player with more claimed rings than you, that character gets +2[Military].

card.name: Venerable Fortunist
card.property: Action: Return a ring in your claimed ring pool that matches the the element of your role to the unclaimed ring pool - gain 2 fate.

card.name: Kobo Ichi-Kai Jujutsu
card.property: Restricted. (No more than two restricted attachments per character.) X is equal to the greatest number of rings claimed by a single opponent.

card.name: Common Cause
card.property: Action: Sacrifice a (friendly) character and choose another character - ready the chosen character. If that character is controlled by another player, honor it.

card.name: The Crashing Wave
card.property: Support. (Another player may help pay this card's fate cost.)Reaction: After an attack is declared against a province but before the province is revealed, choose an eligible province you control - move the conflict to the chosen province and reveal it, if able. You are now the defending player if you were not already.

card.name: Fulfill Your Duty
card.property: Action: During a conflict, sacrifice a (friendly) character - the attacked province gets +X strength until the end of the conflict, where X is the sacrificed character's [Military] skill (including modifiers).

card.name: A Game of Letters
card.property: Action: During a [Political] conflict, choose a participating character and a status token on a character controlled by a different player - - if you chose an honored status token, honor the chosen character. - if you chose a dishonored status token, dishonor the chosen character.

card.name: Favorable Alliance
card.property: Support. Action: Set aside cards from the top of up to two conflict decks, yours and the that of the player who supports you, until X cards are set aside. Those cards are faceup and out of play. Both you and the player who supports you may play those cards as if they were in their hand.

card.name: Cultured Facade
card.property: Action: During a conflict - until the end of the conflict, each participating character cannot be chosen as the target of an event played by a player whose honor bid is higher than that of the character's controller.

card.name: Return the Offense
card.property: Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Political] duel between two characters controlled by different players, even if you do not control either of them - resolve the duel. Until the end of the conflict, the duel's winner does not bow as the result of conflict resolution and the duel's loser cannot be readied by card effects.

card.name: Inscribed Tantō
card.property: While you have claimed the [Void] ring, attached character is immune to opponents' ring effects.

card.name: Contemplative Wisdom
card.property: Restricted. Support. Attached character gains: "Action: During a conflict, return a ring from your claimed ring pool to the unclaimed ring pool. Choose a participating character - that character gains each of this character's printed abilities until the end of the conflict."

card.name: Unquestioned Heritage
card.property: Action: If you have claimed the [Air] ring, choose an attachment on a character you control - move that attachment to another character.

card.name: Impossible Kōan
card.property: Support. (Another player may help pay this card's fate cost.)Action: During a conflict - set each character's base [Military] and base [Political] skills to 1 until the end of the conflict.

card.name: Take Up Command
card.property: Attached character gains the Commander trait and: "Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating, choose a Bushi character you control with printed cost 2 or lower - ready that character and move it to the conflict."

card.name: Called to War
card.property: Action: Choose a Bushi character. Each opponent may give you 1 honor and choose a Bushi character - place 1 fate on each chosen character.

card.name: All Out Assault
card.property: Reaction: After the conflict phase begins - each time a player has the opportunity to declare an attack this phase, they must attack with as many of their characters as are able.

card.name: Privileged Position
card.property: Reaction: After honor dials are revealed during an honor bid - each opponent who bid higher than you cannot declare more than one conflict against you this round.

card.name: Peacemaker's Blade
card.property: This attachment cannot be played on an attacking character. Restricted. (No more than two restricted attachments per character.) Attached character cannot be declared as an attacker.

card.name: Trick of the Light
card.property: Action: During a conflict, choose a participating character - until the end of the conflict, treat that character as if its printed text box was blank (except for Traits).

card.name: Appeal to Sympathy
card.property: Support. (Another player may help pay this card's fate cost.)Interrupt: When the effects of an event would initiate - cancel those effects and put that event on top of its owner's conflict deck.

card.name: Ramparts of Stone
card.property: Limited. (No more than one limited card can be played by each player each round.)Action: During a conflict, the attacking player must select one - either bow each participating character they control, or discard 3 cards from their hand.

card.name: Bayushi Traitor
card.property: When you play this character, it enters play under the control of an opponent of your choice. (You may still put fate on it.) This character cannot participate in conflicts against its owner.

card.name: Imbued With Shadows
card.property: Action: Lose X honor. Choose X characters - discard a status token from each of those characters.

card.name: Compelling Testimony
card.property: Support. (Another player may help pay this card's fate cost.)Action: During a [Political] conflict, choose a participating character - that character gets -4[Political] until the end of the conflict.

card.name: Criminal Contacts
card.property: Play only if your honor bid is higher than an opponent's. Action: Choose a character. Each opponent may give you 1 honor to choose a character - discard 1 fate from each chosen character.

card.name: Expert Bartering
card.property: Action: You may spend 1 fate. Choose another attachment (you may only choose one an opponent controls if you spent 1 fate) - switch this attachment with the chosen attachment. If you do not control the chosen attachment, exchange control of them as well.

card.name: Way of the Open Hand
card.property: Action: During a conflict against a non-stronghold province, choose a participating character you do not control - move that character home and put 1 fate on it.

card.name: Diversionary Maneuver
card.property: Action: During a [Military] conflict in which you are the attacking player, choose an eligible province not currently being attacked - bow and move home each participating. Move the conflict to the chosen province and reveal it, if able. Move any number of ready characters you control to the conflict, then your opponent does so as well.

card.name: Join the Fray
card.property: Support. Action: During a [Military] conflict choose a Cavalry character in your provinces and a player - put that character into play in the conflict on that player's side. (You still control the character, but its skill contributes towards that player's side in the conflict.)

card.name: Hige's Sermon
card.property: Limited. (No more than one limited card can be played by each player each round.)Action: During the draw phase, each player in turn order chooses a different character they do not control - bow each of those characters.

card.name: Seize the Day
card.property: Reduce the cost to play this card by 1 if you have 2 or more opponents. Reaction: After the conflict phase begins - you become the first player.

card.name: Enlightenment
card.property: Action: Resolve the effect of each ring in your claimed ring pool as if you were the attacking player. Then, if all five rings are in your claimed ring pool, you win the game.
